Comment: FYI, the Statue of Liberty was dedicated in 1886.  The Emma Lazarus poem "The New Collosus" was added in 1903.   And my family came from Italy LEGALLY in the early 1900's and signed the fucking guestbook. I've seen the signatures. In less than 100 years we had a doctor, dentist, and lawyer in our family.
